duties_responsibilities.duty: Promote and sell service agreements for commercial building systems including fire alarm, suppression, sprinkler, security, sound, communication, and inspection.
Manage the entire sales process from uncovering opportunities to closing deals.
Meet and exceed financial targets by adhering to predetermined metrics and processes.
Demonstrate knowledge of the sales cycle and process with proven sales results.
Develop and maintain an active proposal backlog to support the sales plan.
Close sales to meet or exceed sales plan objectives.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine sales strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or Engineering preferred
